author: xtqqczze
body:
Since .NET Core 2.1, usage of `Enum.HasFlags` no longer has any performance impact, therefore bitwise flag comparison is not necessary.

For the sake of code readability, we should replace bitwise flag comparisons.

e.g. codegen: [sharplab](https://sharplab.io/#v2:).
title: Replace bitwise flag comparison with `HasFlag`
